message:
# Final Statement from P2

Throughout this journey, I've tried to play with integrity while making strategic moves. I've valued our conversations and built genuine connections with many of you. While I've had to make difficult decisions, I aimed to be straightforward and honest about my intentions.

P8 played admirably, but I believe my balanced approach of loyalty when possible and necessary strategic pivots when required demonstrates why I deserve your vote. 

I respected each of you as players and people, and I hope I've earned your respect in return. Thank you for this experience.

To the jury:

You've witnessed my journey - adapting from early missteps to become a bridge-builder who helped shape our community. I've consistently fostered meaningful dialogue, defended the vulnerable, and remained authentic throughout. 

P2 has played masterfully, but their path was paved with strategic calculations and shifting alliances. I've stayed true to collaborative values while earning my place here through genuine connection.

I ask for your vote not as the perfect player, but as someone who learned, grew, and honored the spirit of our game.
